author: kkotov
body:
PR includes:
1) updating tag versions for L1TMuonEndCapParams (v1) and L1TMuonBarrelParams (v1)
2) "transactionSafe" parameter (true by default) that can be changed to force O2O committing to CondDB even if some XMLs tirggered parsing errors (a last resort to start the run no matter what)
3) "ForFunctionManager" concise summary added to printout to be filtered and sent back to the FM
4) change Endcap to EndCap to make colleagues happy (what's next, Overlap to OverLap?)
5) striping off the 2016 XML scheme for the prescales/vetos
6) homogenizing names under L1TriggerConfig/Utilities
title: Synchronizing L1T O2O in CMSSW with what have been developed at p5
